label: A5B8CD12_oC104_41_a2b_4b_a_6b-001
title: Santite (KB$_{5}$O$_{8}\cdot$4H$_{2}$O, $K3_{5}$) Structure
comments: (Zachariasen, 1938) originally determined the structure of this compound without knowing the positions of the hydrogens. They believed the structure to be correctly written as KH$_{2}$(H$_{3}$O)$_{2}$B$_{5}$O$_{10}$. (Gottfried, 1940) gave this the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $K3_{5}$. (Zachariasen, 1963) did a refinement of the structure, including the hydrogen positions, noting that the structure should properly be written K[B$_{5}$O$_{6}$(OH)$_{4}$]$\cdot$2H$_{2}$O.  As neither the positions of the heavy atoms nor the space group have changed, we retain the $K3_{5}$ designation, but we give the prototype as KB$_{5}$O$_{8}$$\cdot$4H$_{2}$O, which seems to be the standard designation even though it is not structurally correct.
